name: Soldner: Secret Wars
description: Can you dominate more than 18 million square miles of battlefield? Soldner: Secret Wars gives you more than 60 modern military weapons and 70 high-tech vehicles to prove that you have what it takes. Weapons include machine guns, sniper rifles, rocket launchers, missiles, and more. Take the controls of combat vehicles, ranging from an Apache to an Abrams battle tank, and engage in firefights with up to 32 players. The game also includes mod tools that you can use to make your own missions.
